thread.title_full: Everything to know about Texas-Kansas State, including predictions, analysis, TV info and more | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Everything to know about Texas-Kansas State, including predictions, analysis, TV info and more
text:
Kansas State at Texas
The Longhorns have an opportunity to keep their momentum rolling after beating Oklahoma 24-17 on Oct. 10. A win would put Texas in a better position make a bowl game. The Longhorns will have to prove that Kansas State doesn't have their number as the Wildcats have won six of the last seven games in the series.
Kansas State is looking for its first win in Big 12 play. The Wildcats have lost two closes games in conference play against Oklahoma State and TCU. But Kansas State suffered its worst loss Saturday against the Sooners, 55-0. Saturday's game against Texas will be a chance for the Wildcats to bounce back from their blowout loss. -- Nick Castillo
Who: Kansas State (3-3, 0-3 Big 12) at Texas (2-4, 1-2)
When: 11 a.m. Saturday
Where: Darrell K.Royal-Texas Memorial Stadium in Austin
Line: Texas by 4 (as of Wednesday morning)
TV/radio: Fox Sports 1 / KRLD-AM (1080)
Full coverage: Predictions, analysis, more
